description:
Our name normalizer and enrichment micro-service address the shortcomings of standard text normalization. Initially the
text input is split into tokens. This process takes into account some conventions of formatting. Any dashes present
between two tokens preserves the relationship of those two tokens. Conversely a comma between two tokens ensures
that the separation between the two tokens is maintained. The order of tokens is also preserved. Standard text
normalization (conversion to lowercase, trimming extra white space, and canonicalization) is then applied to the tokens.
Once normalized every unique and sequence of tokens is given confidence values by comparing the normalized values to
publicly available data.
name: Name Normalizer

permissions.exemptionText: This source code is restricted by patent and / or intellectual property law.
